docs.lead_paragraph: Congress may be moving to repeal "Obamacare," but millions of people are still signing up. The administration said Tuesday that 11.5 million enrolled nationwide through Dec. 24, ahead of last year's pace.

headline.main: Obama Health Law Posts Solid Sign-Ups Despite GOP Repeal Vow

docs.lead_paragraph: The president explains in an interview why the new E.P.A. rules on carbon are so pivotal.
docs.abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column offers highlights of interview he conducted with Pres Obama regarding climate change; notes that interview was conducted as Obama administration was drawing up new Environmental Protection Agency rules to curb carbon emissions from power plants.

docs.lead_paragraph: Administration officials said the trip was intended in part to highlight the extraordinary economic benefits of national parks in their centennial year.
docs.abstract: Pres Obama vacations with his family in Yosemite National Park, where they visit Carlsbad Caverns; series of Obama family vacations to national parks are intended to highlight benefits of protecting wilderness land, part of Obama administration's legacy on conservation.

headline.main: President Obama and Family Tour ‘Cool’ Carlsbad Caverns

docs.lead_paragraph: The first daughter is in the middle of the pressure-filled process of writing personal essays, asking for teacher recommendations and narrowing her choices.

docs.lead_paragraph: Label-checking the first daughters Sasha and Malia Obama, now 14 and 11, can be risky for designers if they seem to be capitalizing on the girls as celebrities.
docs.abstract: Eric Wilson notes that much attention has been paid to emerging styles of Pres Obama's daughters Sasha and Malia since his re-election; observes that designers who label-check first daughters run risk of appearing as if they are capitalizing on the girls as celebrities.

headline.main: White House Style Watch Expands by 2
headline.seo: Sasha and Malia Thrust Into Fashion Roles
headline.print_headline: White House Style Watch Expands by 2

docs.lead_paragraph: On sale for about a week, "Of Thee I Sing," President Obama's 31-page children's picture book, an ode to 13 inspirational Americans written as a letter to his daughters, Malia and Sasha, is already on the best-seller lists on Amazon.com and BN.com.
